field.name: summary
field.value: add ability to specify fallback components that should never take precedence over non-fallback ones

field.name: description
field.value:
That would be the opposite of default components, basically:
register Foo as IFoo as fallback register Foo2 as IFoo
var foo = resolve IFoo
foo should be Foo2, even though it was registered after Foo, since Foo was registered as a fallback, that is it should be used only if no other non-fallback component was registered, and always gets overriden by other non-fallback components for that service.
